searches.description: Any time a user sees the Flight Results page for a selected route, this counts as one search.

medianFare.description: This is the median fare that has been collected from the Flight Results page for a given route. FareNet usually collects the lowest fare though exceptions may apply.

bookings.description: Bookings are counted whenever a user completes a flight reservation for a given route in the selected date range.

airIndex.description: Numeric value between 0 and 1 that is obtained by combining two key factors: route search volume and price change behavior by route

viewableImpressions.description: Number of module views where the user has seen at least 50% of a fare visualization or search module for one continuous second

fsi.description: Number of Flight Search Initiations (FSI) after viewing a module

fsiRate.description: The percentage of flight search initiations after viewing a module

userInteractions.description: Number of clicks on fare visualizations or search modules

imprAssistedConvRate.description: The percentage of flight bookings after viewing a module

fsiAssistedConversions.description: The number of flight bookings after initiating a flight search

fsiAssistedConvRate.description: The percentage of flight bookings after viewing a module

fsiAssistedRevenue.description: The total revenue booked after users initiated a flight search after clicking on a module

lookToBook.description: Look-to-Book Ratio is the number of conversions divided by the number of searches on the Flight Results Page in the IBE

uniquePageviews.description: Unique Pageviews aggregates pageviews that are generated by the same user during the same session. A unique pageview represents the number of sessions during which that page was viewed one or more times.

uniquePageviewFsiRate.description: Number of clicks on a fare visualization or flight search module divided by Unique Pageviews.

revenue.description: This is the total income that an airline has from flight bookings.
